bibl.title: A Wolf at the Table: Sympotic Perjury in Archilochus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: By investigating the theme of perjury in the epode of the eagle and the fox (fragments 172-181 West), proposes to cast new light on the imagery and the structure of the text, as well as on its performative and social significance.
bibl.seg: GAGNÉ Renaud, A Wolf at the Table: Sympotic Perjury in Archilochus. Avec résumé en anglais.
